posts.post_title: T205s, T206s and more to trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bob Donaldson
I've a number of t205s, t206s and other vintage cards to trade.  Mostly lower grade although a few are nicer.  

Looking for prewar hits to my wantlist specifically
T202s
T205s
Diamond Stars
1939 Playballs
41 Double Plays
1971 Bazooka
1967 Hi Numbers

Scans at [url]http://tcardstotrade.shutterfly.com[/url]

my wantlist is [url]http://www.oldbaseball.com/wantlists/bdonaldson.htm[/url]

thanks

Bob
